original_text: So he changed his behavior before them and pretended to be insane in their hands and made marks on the doors of the gate and let his spittle run down his beard.
korean_text: 그들 앞에서 그의 행동을 변하여 미친 체하고 대문짝에 그적거리며 침을 수염에 흘리매

sentences.original_text: So he changed his behavior before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그들 앞에서 자신의 행동을 바꾸었고

sentences.original_text: and pretended to be insane in their hands
and made marks on the doors of the gate
and let his spittle run down his beard
